ygData.subject: Re: Financial Aid
ygData.msgSnippet: I know about that site. but they dont really talk about which skill is required for which stone...above a skill of 8. Skara ... From: Tim Borelli
ygData.messageBody:
I know about that site. but they dont really talk about which skill is
required for which stone...above a skill of 8.
Skara

-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Borelli [mailto:timb@...]
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 2:28 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Financial Aid


From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>

go here:

http://eq.stratics.com/skills_trade_jc.shtml

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 14th lvl enchanter

At 02:26 PM 4/26/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
>it seems to me that the first magic rings you can make cost around 2 or 3
>plats to make.. but I suppose that you can sell them for more...with a base
>skill of 21, I dont want to waste money making non-magic rings. With which
>stone do you think I can start practice with? do I have to start from
>malachite? can I start with Onyx? or even more expensive stones? thanks for
>the help.
>Also, can you tell me which rings you found out are the best to sell to
>players?
>Thanks,
>Skara
>

-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
Volition, Inc.
